thread.title: Free Photo Heart Deal for Valentine’s Day!
thread.title_full: Free Photo Heart Deal for Valentine’s Day!

author: Scary Mommy
title: Free Photo Heart Deal for Valentine’s Day!
text:
Scary Mommy Feb 5, 2017 
We’re suckers for doing cool things with pictures over here – what’s the point of taking so many if they only live on your phone? And we especially love these personalized Photo Hearts from Photo Barn … 
Each Photo Heart is 4″ tall and 4″ wide and is a two-sided print (you can put photos or patterns or a mix.). They come with a wooden base so they can stand on any flat surface. They’re the perfect gift for just about anyone. Best of all? You can snag one FREE (Reg. $30), and just pay shipping. 
Just visit Photo Barn and use code LUVHEART at checkout. All items ordered by Feb 6th will arrive by Valentine’s Day. 
Happy shopping!
